description: The IN2 segment contains additional insurance policy coverage and benefit information necessary for proper billing and reimbursement. Fields used by this segment are defined by HICFA or other regulatory agencies.

10.name: Champus Id Number
10.description: this field is defined by HCFA or other regulatory agencies

11.name: Dependent Of Champus Recipient
11.description: defined by HCFA or other regulatory agencies

12.name: Champus Organization
12.description: defined by HCFA or other regulatory agencies

13.name: Champus Station
13.description: defined by HCFA or other regulatory agencies

14.name: Champus Service
14.description: defined by HCFA or other regulatory agencies. Refer to table 0140 - Champus service for suggested values

15.name: Champus Rank / Grade
15.description: This user-defined field identifies the CHAMPUS military rank/grade of the insured. Refer to table 0141 - Champus rank/grade for suggested values

16.name: Champus Status
16.description: defined by HCFA or other regulatory agencies. Refer to table 0142 - Champus status for suggested values

17.name: Champus Retire Date
17.description: defined by HCFA or other regulatory agencies

21.name: Blood Deductible
21.description: it is recommended that this field be used instead of UB2-2-blood deductible as the blood deductible can be associated with the specific insurance plan via this field

22.name: Special Coverage Approval Name
22.description: name of the individual that approves any special coverage

23.name: Special Coverage Approval Title
23.description: title of the person that approves special coverage

24.name: Non-covered Insurance Code
24.description: code which describes why a service is not covered. Refer to user-defined table 0143 - non-covered insurance code for suggested values

25.name: Payor Id
25.description: required for NEIC processing, identifies the organization from which reimbursement is expected

26.name: Payor Subscriber Id
26.description: required for NEIC processing, identifies the specific office within the insurance carrier designated as responsible for the claim

27.name: Eligibility Source
27.description: required for NEIC processing, identifies the source of information about the insured's eligibility for benefits. Refer to user-defined table 0144 - eligibility source for suggested entries

28.name: Room Coverage Type / Amount
28.description: room type (e.g., private, semi-private) and amount (e.g., rate, percentage, differential) covered by the insurance. It is recommended that this field be used instead of IN1-40-room rate - semi-private and IN141-room rate - private. Refer to user-defined tables 0145 - room type and 0146 - amount type for suggested entries

29.name: Policy Type / Amount
29.description: policy type (e.g., ancillary, major medical) and amount (e.g., amount, percentage, limit) covered by the insurance. It is recommended that this field is used instead of IN1-38-policy limit - amount. Refer to userdefined tables 0147 - policy type and 0193 - amount class for suggested entries

30.name: Daily Deductible
30.description: number of days after which to begin the daily deductible, the amount of the deductible, and the number of days to apply the deductible

4.name: Employer Information Data
4.description: required employer information data for UB82 form locator 71. Refer to user-defined table 0139 - employer information data for suggested values

5.name: Mail Claim Party
5.description: party to which the claim should be mailed

6.name: Medicare Health Insurance Card Number
6.description: this field is defined by HCFA or other regulatory agencies

7.name: Medicaid Case Name
7.description: this field is defined by HCFA or other regulatory agencies

8.name: Medicaid Case Number
8.description: this field is defined by HCFA or other regulatory agencies

9.name: Champus Sponsor Name
9.description: this field is defined by HCFA or other regulatory agencies
